name: Hawk
description:
Controls :

Flap - W / up

Glide - J / space

Turn - AD / left right

my keyboard has a problem with pressing left while i press space+up, if you experience similar issue try switch to WADJ scheme, might help

Special Thanks :

this violent crustacean, the guy who came up with the game idea, strangely attracted to blood, might be the first vampiric crustacean
